name: Homestuck: Act 1 - ORIGINAL DEVELOPMENT BUILD 2002
description:
This is an original development build for the 2003 GBA game "Homestuck: Act 1"

After McDonald's released the original GBA cartridges minigames on their Happy Meals (as tie in with the Squiddles toys) and found moderate success, the producers wanted to release a full game based on the characters. It was supposed to release in parts (or "Acts", as the game would call them) Only one game was made though, since it was a commercial failure.

This is only for archival purposes.

"Ectobiology" midi rendition by Putnam: https://homestuck.net/music/sheetmusic/
Coding and graphics done by me.

Made using Butano: https://github.com/GValiente/butano
